name: Creamy Tomato-Basil Pasta with Shrimp
author: Philadelphia
summary: You might want to hire a waiter to serve this one. With fresh tomatoes and chopped basil along with savory shrimp and pasta, it's that close to a seriously high-end entrée.
ingredients: ¼ cup KRAFT Sun-Dried Tomato Vinaigrette Dressing, divided
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
4 ounces PHILADELPHIA Neufchatel Cheese, 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese
½ cup KRAFT Shredded Parmesan Cheese
8  fresh basil leaves, cut into strips
directions: Cook pasta as directed on package
dressing in large skillet on medium heat
Add shrimp; cook and stir 2 to 3 min
Use slotted spoon to remove shrimp from skillet; cover to keep warm
Add remaining dressing, broth and seasonings to skillet; cook 2 min
Add Neufchatel; cook and stir 2 to 3 min
Stir in Parmesan and half the basil; top with shrimp and remaining basil
